function.name: freezerTemperature_setValue
function.description: This function is used to set the freezer temperature of a refrigerator.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to set the freezer temperature.

predefinedCompartment.description: The predefined compartment to set the temperature for.

settingTemperature.description: The temperature value to set for the freezer.

predefinedSettingTemperatureUnit.description: The unit of the temperature value to set for the freezer.
